description: This app, "Macros: How Do You Do This In SAS?", for HP TouchPad is one of a series of eBooks about SAS software programming focusing on frequently asked questions and answers about SAS macros, illustrated by code samples which can be sent by email directly from the app.  It is designed to encourage users to contribute questions some of which will be included in future versions of the app.  There are controls to select specific questions, move to the previous or next question, decrease or increase the font to suit the user's preference, and send emails requesting answers to questions not yet included in that version of the eBook.
versionNote: 2.0.0: Standardised text formatting.  1.1.0: Added new book to Author section.
